snippet: Justice Yvonne Lewis had been accused of improperly approving payments to her clerk, Kimberly L. Detherage, for her work as a court-appointed lawyer, a potential conflict of interest.
abstract: New York State Commission on Judicial Conduct announces State Supreme Court Judge Yvonne Lewis has resigned in wake of accusations of misconduct; Lewis is accused of improperly approving payments to her clerk Kimberly L Detherage and improperly presiding over guardianship cases in which Detherage was court-appointed guardian.
lead_paragraph: Justice Yvonne Lewis had been accused of improperly approving payments to her clerk, Kimberly L. Detherage, for her work as a court-appointed lawyer, a potential conflict of interest.

headline.main: Brooklyn Judge Resigning Amid Questions About Payments to Her Clerk
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Judge to Step Down Amid Questions About Payments to Her Clerk
